glsa.title: Mono: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A hash collision vulnerability in Mono allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Mono is an open source implementation of Microsoftâ€™s .NET Framework.

description.p: Mono does not properly randomize hash functions for form posts to protect against hash collision attacks.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send specially crafted parameters, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Mono users should upgrade to the latest version:
